Recreation

Explore nature, discover the wild, and immerse yourself in the journey.

  • Home
  • Our blog
  • The last summer days

Do you have sheer love for the outdoors?

Are you looking for a therapeutic escape from your urban routine? Embark on a journey of exploration, as you immerse yourself in Pakistan’s stunning nature. From the majestic mountain ranges, glaciers, high-altitude lakes, meadows and natural springs of the North, to the scenic coastline of the South, our recreational experiences are sure to help you discover wilderness in its purest form, and to leave you in awe and at peace.

Mubarak Village \ Bhit Khorri

Mubarak Village is extremely gorgeous with a beautiful blend of hills, rock formations, sandy beaches & refreshing water, a combination that is guaranteed to uplift and nourish most people. Supplemented by an incredible Baloch community with a history of approx 300 years. TACTACK has worked with this community for over 4 years now and developed a sustainable model, ensuring real growth & progress.

The sun-drenched beaches allow individuals to have an awe-inspiring experience, as they tackle the waves and explore a beautiful and undiscovered paradise. Through experiential learning students leave these beaches mentally and spiritually at peace, in a manner that can only be achieved through healthy physical exertion and integration with nature.

Contact us for your exclusive experiences, our team will organise the perfect bespoke trip for you! Contact us right away for a free consultation!

Wild Balochistan

At TACTACK we are strong believers that being integrated with Mother Earth is a fundamental part of being human. Kund Malir beach is a unique gem located in Hingol National Park in Balochistan. Simultaneously featuring rocky mountains, sandy deserts, and a serene ocean, it provides a deep, enriching and one- of-a-kind outdoor experience that is sure to help you discover wilderness in its purest form. With “Wild Balochistan”, seize the opportunity to swim in Kund Malir’s pure waters, enjoy stimulating beach games, and engage with others around a bonfire as night falls. TACTACK offers comfortable transportation for the four-hour scenic drive to and from Karachi, as well as spacious camping accommodation and great quality food.

Contact us for your exclusive experiences, our team will organise the perfect bespoke trip for you! Contact us right away for a free consultation!

“The Baltistan” - Skardu Shigar Deosai Khaplu Ghanche Kharmang

Home to some of nature’s most valuable gifts, this region is a magical mountain paradise tucked away in the northern territories of Pakistan. Featuring awe-inspiring glaciers, high-altitude lakes, natural springs, vast deserts, breathtaking plains, rich flora and fauna, and immense history within the deep sub-cultures of Pakistan. Supplemented by incredible community members that TACTACK has worked with for over 4 years now and developed a sustainable model, ensuring real growth & progress. Through a variety of activities our guests are always eager to experience these areas over and over again.

The students understand the significance of the lake and how it is a major source of water for Karachi. Gain an understanding of how Keenjhar Lake freshwater wetlands ecosystem is being degraded by increased urban and domestic effluent discharge, and irresponsible tourism. Interact with the local village elders and discuss how they have had to look for alternate sources of income due to the decreasing fish population.

Contact us for your exclusive experiences, our team will organise the perfect bespoke trip for you! Contact us right away for a free consultation!

“Mystery Mountain” - Fairy Meadows

Nanga Parbat, one of the grandest mountains in the world, resting within the Himalayan range, with an altitude of 8,126 metres (26,660 ft), making it the ninth highest mountain in the world, is inspiringly experienced from the beautiful lush green Fairy Meadows. With the added possible experience of the magical Rupal Face & Herlig Koffer basecamp, a trip to this mountain range is a must for every single human-being! There are many ways of organising an everlasting tour to this region, that is cradled within one of the most unique typographies in the world. Supplemented by an incredible community that TACTACK has worked with for over 4 years now and developed a sustainable model, ensuring real growth & progress. Through a variety of activities our guests are always eager to experience these areas over and over again.

Contact us for your exclusive experiences, our team will organise the perfect bespoke trip for you! Contact us right away for a free consultation!
